mapper.select: select sum(total_cnt) from (select count(*) total_cnt, ${receiveMemberId} memberId from ${message_receive} where ${receiveMemberId}=#{memberId} and ${messageSave}='Y' union all select count(*) total_cnt, ${sendMemberId} memberId from ${message_send} where ${sendMemberId}=#{memberId} and ${messageSave}='Y')

select message_id, member_id, from_to_id, from_to_nickname, from_to, title, content, date_created from(select rownum rn, a.* from( select * from(select ${sendMessageId} as message_id, ${sendMemberId} as member_id, ${receiveMemberId} as from_to_id, ${receiveMemberNickname} as from_to_nickname, '[보낸 편지]' as from_to, ${messageTitle} as title, ${messageContent} as content, ${messageDateCreated} as date_created from ${message_send} where ${sendMemberId}=#{memberId} and ${messageSave}='Y' union all select ${receiveMessageId} as message_id, ${receiveMemberId} as member_id, ${sendMemberId} as from_to_id, ${sendMemberNickname} as from_to_nickname, '[받은 편지]' as from_to, ${messageTitle} as title, ${messageContent} as content, ${messageDateCreated} as date_created from ${message_receive} where ${receiveMemberId}=#{memberId} and ${messageSave}='Y') order by date_created desc)a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
